He is requesting the loan to buy spare parts to fix the two machines and be able to better serve his costumers.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for video game machines.

loans.name: Adela Catalina

texts.es:
Adela de 48 años, tiene un negocio de venta de comidas. Empezó con el negocio de comida hace 6 años atrás, poco a poco con esfuerzo pudo comprar sillas y mesas. Ahora ella tiene un puesto en el Guasmo, vende platos típicos del Ecuador, como arroz con pollo, arroz con menestra etc. 

Ella comprar con el préstamo  arroz y aceite para hacer mas comidas. En el futuro quiere terminar de construir su casa que ahora es de caña para ubicar hay un local de comida.
texts.en:
48 year-old Adela has a business selling meals.  She started her business 6 years ago and gradually, with effort, she was able to buy tables and chairs.  She now has a stall in Guasmo where she sells traditional Ecuadoran dishes such as rice with chicken, rice with mixed vegetables, etc.

Adela will use her loan to buy rice and oil to make her meals.  In the future, she would like to finish building her house, which is currently made from cane, in order to create premises there for selling her meals.

loans.use: to buy tables, rice and oil

loans.name: Ester Beatriz

texts.es:
Ester es una pequeña comerciante, con su propio negocio, un cafetín que tiene en su casa de habitación, en donde vende comida, platos rápidos como: hoddog, hamburguesa, repostería, gaseosas, y alquiler  de dos cuartos. Con estos financiamientos en  Afodenic, sus niveles de venta aumentaron al ofrecer más variedad en sus productos.
A si como mejores condiciones de vivienda, ya que ha mejorado las puertas, ha comprado portón, repellado paredes. Hoy con este nuevo préstamo dará mantenimiento al cuarto de alquiler para seguir brindando mejores condiciones a sus clientes, en el cambio de techo y pintura. Como obtener mejores resultados económicos.
texts.en:
Ester is a small buisinesswoman with her own business. She has a small cafe in her house where she serves food. She sells fast food such as: hotdogs, hamburgers, pastries, and soft drinks. She also rents out two rooms. With these loans in Afodenic, her sales increased when she offered more products. 

She also has better living conditions, since she has improved the doors, bought a gate, and repaired the walls. Today, with this new loan, she will do maintenance on a room for rent in order to continue offering better conditions to her customers. She will change the roof and paint. With this, she will obtain better financial results.

loans.use: to buy zinc sheeting to change the roof on a room and paint.

loans.name: Lucrecia Clementina

texts.es: Lucrecia Clementina se dedica a la venta de gaseosas, bolsas plásticas y platos desechables. Tiene más de 12 años de tener este negocio. Su mayor desafío es poder mantener a su clientela, ella tiene cierto tiempo de trabajar con Fundación y se encuentra muy contenta con este medio de vida, compra sus productos en el mercado cada semana y los la mayoría de sus productos los ofrece de manera ambulante y en su vivienda. Solicita el crédito para la comprar gaseosas, productos plásticos entre otras cosas. Enfrentar  diferentes desafíos harán que cada día logre adquirir experiencia necesaria.
texts.en:
Lucrecia Clementina sells soda, plastic bags and disposable plates.  She has been in this business for more than 12 years.  Her major challenge is keeping her customers.  She has been working with Fundación Leon 2000 for a while and is very happy with this way of making a living.  She buys her products in the market every week and sells most of her products as an itinerant street vendor and from her home.

Lucrecia is requesting this loan to buy soda and plastic products.  Facing challenges in her business has enabled Lucrecia to gain experience.

loans.use: to buy soda and plastic products

loans.name: Jazmin 1, 2 & 3 Group

texts.en:
Elizabeth is one of our enterprising women, like the others in this group dedicated to selling miscellaneous products like: cosmetics, clothing, home use items, beauty supplies, among other. Elizabeth sells goods for daily consumption, in her little food store. Products like rice, beans, sugar, oil, bread, canned meals and many other, will be found in her little store. This loan will be used to increase her inventory. She is mother of  two children and is a married woman. 

She is a member of the Jazmin 1, 2 & 3, group which is composed of 15 micro-entrepreneurs from north Santo Domingo. Elizabeth is getting her 1st loan from Esperanza Internacional. She has managed to strengthen her business and make good investments. She has had her business for around four years and she started it after she took out a loan from a neighbor who is involved in the lending activity.   She will reinvest profits into her business. Thank you for your support!

loans.use: to buy bags of rice, beans, sugar, etc.

loans.name: Andrés

texts.es:
Andrés tiene 27 años de edad, es soltero y  reside junto a sus padres en el sector Chacupe Bajo ubicado en el Distrito de  La Victoria, una zona urbana caracterizada por ser zona agrícola, está ubicada a 15 minutos de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Andrés se dedica a brindar servicio de transporte público de pasajeros en su mototaxi (vehículo que consta de una moto y una cabina donde transporta a personas a las diversas zonas de destino). El ya tiene cinco años dedicándose a esta actividad y gracias a ella solventa los gastos económicos de su familia. Adicionalmente se dedica a la agricultura.

Andrés desea realizar algunas mejoras en su vivienda de modo que su familia pueda vivir en mejores condiciones, asimismo desea realizar algunos arreglos a su vehículo. Por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar por primera vez a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1500 nuevos soles.
texts.en:
Andrés is 27 years old, single, and lives with his parents in Chacupe Bajo, in La Victoria district.  This is an urban area that is characterized by the fact that it is also an agricultural area.  It is located 15 minutes from the city of Chiclayo.

Andrés provides a public passenger transport service in his 'mototaxi' (a vehicle which consists of a motorbike with a cabin in back which is used for transporting people to their destinations).  He has been in this business for five years and it has helped him to cover his family's financial expenses.  He also farms.

Andrés would like to make some improvements to his home so that his family can live in better conditions.  He would also like to make some repairs to his vehicle.  For this reason, he has requested a loan for 1,500 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa.

loans.use: to improve his home and make repairs to his vehicle

loans.name: Esperanza Del Socorro

texts.es:
Esperanza es una mujer trabajadora para el bienestar familiar, de sus cinco hijos, que junto con su esposo, se esfuerzan para poder cubrir los gastos.
Su negocio es el alquiler de dos cuarto, como alquiler de teléfono, que ha venido dando mantenimiento con préstamo en Afodenic atreves de los financiamientos, de siete ciclos, lo que ha sido de gran beneficio económico en su vida personal.
Con este nuevo crédito, lograra la construcción de un nuevo cuarto, con el objetivo de aumentar sus ingresos, el cual espera terminarlo poco  a poco. Comprara materiales de construcción como: bloques, quintales de hierro, piedra, cemento, madera, entre otros y comenzar la obra.
texts.en:
Esperanza is a woman who works hard for her family's well-being.  She has five children and, together with her husband, makes every effort to cover expenses.  

Her business is the rental of two rooms and a telephone.  She has been able to keep up maintenance with loans she's received through Afrodenic on seven occasions.  This has given her enormous financial support in her private life.

She will use this loan to build a new room, which she will finish little by little so she can increase income.  She plans to buy construction materials such as bricks, iron rods, stone, cement, wood, etc. and begin construction work.

loans.use: To buy construction materials to build another rental room for extra income

loans.name: Hicela

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Charapoto se reúne cada quince días el Banco Comunal San Esteban. Esta localidad se conoce por su cultura tradicional y  por estar a pocos minutos de dos de las  mejores playas de la provincia como son San Jacinto y San Clemente.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora Hicela, ella tiene 47 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tiene cuatro hijos, tres mayores de edad y uno de 16 años, los mismos que estudian tres en Universidad y el menor en colegio, todos viven con ella. Su esposo es Ing. Eléctrico.

Es maestra de un centro educativo en Charapoto, ella realiza el crédito para ayudar a su esposo que además de trabajar en obras de su profesión también se dedica a la agricultura todo el año, cuenta con el terreno y herramientas, el siembra arroz y frutas como sandia y melón, los mismos que en tiempo de cosecha los lleva a los mercados de la provincia para venderlos a comerciantes.

Este crédito es para comprar insumos agrícolas, abonos y también para pagar mano de obra. Está en el Banco Comunal  10 años y le gusta la facilidad para conseguir el crédito. Sus metas son seguir de maestra y dia a dia innovar sus conocimientos y algún dia tener un  negocio estable.
texts.en:
Every fortnight, the members of the San Esteban community bank meet in the town of Charapoto.  This town is known for its traditional culture and the fact that it is located just a few minutes from two of the best beaches in the province: San Jacinto and San Clemente.

Here we meet Hicela.  She is 47 years old, married, and has four children.  Three of her children are grown up and the other is 16.  The eldest three are studying at university and her youngest is in high school.  All of her children live with her.  Her husband is an electrical engineer.

Hicela is a teacher at a school in Charapoto.  She is requesting this loan to help her husband who, in addition to working in his profession, farms all year round.  He has a plot of land and tools.  He grows rice and fruit such as melons and watermelons.  At harvest time he takes his produce to markets in the province and sells them to traders.

This loan will be used to buy farming supplies and manure, and also to pay laborers.  Hicela has been a member of her community bank for 10 years and she likes the ease with which members can take out loans.  Her goals are to continue working as a teacher and to update her knowledge every day.  Some day she hopes to have a stable business.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies and manure, and to pay laborers

loans.name: Miguel

texts.es: Don Miguel L. T., , tiene 58 años de edad, se dedica a la sastreria, especificamente la elaboración de pants, cuenta con una experiencia de 20 años, con los ingresos de su trabajo ha logrado sostener a su familia. Solicita un prestamo que le servirá para ampliar su capital de trabajo y que lo utilizará para compra de materiales como telas e hilos, para poder producir mas pants de los que actualmente esta trabajando, espera con el prestamo que hace a ASDIR, logre el objetivo de mejorar su produccion y su condición de vida.
texts.en:
Miguel L. T. is 58 years old.  He works as a tailor, making pants, and has 20 years experience.  He uses the income from his work to support his family.

Miguel is requesting a loan so that he can increase his working capital.  He will use it to buy supplies such as fabric and threads so that he can make more pants than at present.  He hopes that, with his loan from ASDIR, he will achieve his goal of improving his production and his living conditions.

loans.use: to buy materials for making clothes

loans.name: Augusto Wilman

texts.es:
Augusto es padre de familia de 37 años de edad, es casado y tiene tres hijos de 6, 10  y 12 años. Viven en casa propia en Chiclayo, la capital de la región de Lambayeque. 

Se dedica a la venta de artículos de limpieza, insecticidas, pesticidas y otros similares, algunos de los cuales son elaborados por él mismo. Cuenta con una experiencia de más de 12 años en este rubro. Tiene un puesto fijo en el Mercado Modelo – Arica y cuenta con una clientela ya establecida y fiel. 

Ha solicitado un préstamo de 1500 nuevos soles para invertir en la compra de más mercadería para vender. También, desea usar una parte de su crédito para solventar gastos escolares para sus tres hijos menores. Edpyme le ofrece su crédito a una tasa de interés más baja que otras entidades bancarias y otros prestamistas informales. Eso le permitirá al cliente trabajar tranquilo sin perjudicar su liquidez diario. Augusto tiene buenas referencias personales y laborales. Es cliente recurrente de Edpyme Alternativa y cumplió con sus otras obligaciones en manera puntual.
texts.en:
Augusto is the father of a family, he is 37 years old and he has three children, aged 6, 10, and 12 years. They live in a house of their own in Chiclayo, the capital city of the region of Lambayeque. 

He sells cleaning supplies, insecticides, pesticides and other similar products, some of which are produced by him. He has more than 12 years' experience in the field. He has a fixed stand at the Modelo-Arica market and he has an established and loyal clientele.

He ahs requested a loan of 1500 nuevos soles to invest the purchase of more merchandise to resell. He also wishes to use a part of his loan to pay for some school expenses for his three young children. Edpyme (Kiva Field Partner) offers him a loan at a lower interest rate than other banking organizations and other private loan organizations. This will permit him to work without having to worry about affecting his daily income. Augusto has good personal and work references. He is a returning client with Edpyme Alternativa and he has previously met his obligations in a timely manner.

loans.use: to purchase cleaning supplies, insecticides, and pesticides for resale

loans.name: Elena

texts.es:
Elena es socia del Banco Comunal “Virgen de Lujan” ubicado en el distrito de Tinicachi, provincia Yunguyo y departamento de Puno, tiene 48 años de edad, de estado civil soltera,  tiene 02 hijos (1 independiente), estudio hasta 1º de educación primaria. 
Trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace seis años, su primer préstamo de S/. 300.00 nuevos soles, invirtió en su negocio, ella se dedica a la venta de artículos artesanales y animales caseros.
Con su nuevo crédito  solicitado de S/. 3000.00 nuevos soles, comprará  20 unidades de aguayos (tejidos), un chancho, oveja, también cuenta que se dedica a la chacra, cultiva papa, habas, choclo y avena, la señora trabaja sola.
Su sueño es crecer en el negocio. Le gusta las reuniones y la puntualidad.
texts.en:
Elena is a member of the Virgen de Lujan Communal Bank.  It is located in the Tinicachi district, Yunguyo province, Puno department.  Elena is 48 years old, single, and has two children (one is independent).  She has a first grade education.

She has been working with the Movimiento Manuela Ramos for six years.  Her first loan was for 300 soles, and she invested it in her business.  She sells handmade items and domestic animals.

She will use the requested loan of 3,000 soles to buy 20 pieces of woven cloth, a pig, and a sheep.  She also says that she farms.  She grows potatoes, beans, corn, and oats.  She works alone.

Her dream is to grow her business.  She likes the meetings and the punctuality.

loans.use: to buy 20 pieces of woven cloth, a pig, and a sheep

loans.name: Hilda Alejandria

texts.es:
Hilda es socia del Banco Comunal “Virgen de Lujan” ubicado en el distrito de Tinicachi, provincia Yunguyo y departamento de Puno, tiene 25 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente y tiene 1 hijo. La señora realizó estudios de educación secundaria. 
Trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace un año, su primer préstamo que fue de S/. 500.00 nuevos soles, lo invirtió en su negocio de venta de tejidos artesanales.
La señora solicitará un  nuevo préstamo por la suma de S/. 1700.00 nuevos soles, dinero que utilizará para comprar cinco madejas de lana para la fabricación de sus tejidos (lliclla).  Su esposo trabaja en construcción civil.
Su sueño es tener una casa y un carro. Le gusta del Banco Comunal las reuniones porque intercambian palabras con las socias.
texts.en:
Hilda is a member of the Communal Bank “Virgen de Lujan” which is located in the District of Tinicachi, Yunguyo Province, Department of Puno. She is 25 years old, in a common law marriage, and has one child. Sra. Hilda completed her high school education.

She has worked with Manuela Ramos for one year. Her first loan of 500 PEN was invested in her business of selling hand-knitted creations.

Hilda is requesting a new loan in the amount of 1700 PEN to purchase five skeins of wool for producing her hand-knitted items. Her husband works in construction.

Hilda dreams of having a house and a car. What she likes most about the Communal Bank are the meetings because she gets to converse with the other members.

loans.use: To purchase five skeins of wool for knitting.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase a wide variety of trousers and undergarments for men and women.

loans.name: Liliana Nataly

texts.es: liliana tiene 24 años de edad, es soltera vive en casa familiar con sus padres, se dedica a la venta de refrescos como ambulante tiene años de experiencia en el rubro decidio dedicarse a este negocio ya que de niña ayudaba a sus familiares en esta actividad y aprendio de ellos. solicitante tiene como objetivo la ampliacion de su negocio en su casa para lo cual desea realizar el mejoramiento de la vivienda donde vive y tiene el sueño de tener un local propio ya que tiene bastante clientela. Liliana invertira el dinero en la compra de ladrillos cemento y otros materiales de construccion.
texts.en: Liliana is 24 years old, single, and lives in the family home. She sells soft drinks and has years of experience in this sector. She decided to pursue this line of work since she was a little girl to help her relatives, and learned from them. She would like to expand her business in her home which is why she would like to improve her home. Her dream is to have her own store since she already has many clients. Liliana will invest the money in the purchase of bricks, cement, and other construction materials.

loans.use: the purchase of bricks, cement, iron, and other construction materials

loans.name: Gaby Evelina

texts.es:
Gaby es socia del Banco Comunal “Virgen de Lujan” ubicado en el distrito de Tinicachi, provincia Yunguyo y departamento de Puno, tiene 19 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente,  tiene 01 hijo.  La señora tiene estudios secundarios.
Viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace un año,  su préstamo inicial  fue de S/. 500.00 nuevos soles, dinero que utilizó en la compra y venta de llicllas (tejidos) y a la crianza de chanchos.
Su nuevo crédito  solicitado fue de S/. 1000.00 nuevos soles, lo utilizará para comprar diez unidades de llicllas, dos unidades de chanchitos y Chacachi (animales de la región), trabaja sola, su esposo trabaja en bordados de mochilas y carteras en la ciudad de Lima.
Su sueño es mejorar como empresaria y tener un negocio más grande.	
Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal son las ganancias del ahorro.
texts.en:
Gaby is a member of the Communal Bank “Virgen de Lujan” which is located in the District of Tinicachi, Yunguyo Province, Department of Puno. She is 19 years old, in a common law marriage, and has one child. Gaby has a high school education.

She has worked with Manuela Ramos for one year. Her first loan of 500 PEN was used to buy and sell “llicllas” (multi-colored woven cloth) and raising pigs.

Her new loan of 1000 PEN that she is requesting will be used to buy ten units of woven cloth, two piglets, and “Chacachi” (regional animals). She works alone and her husband works an embroiderer who produces bags and purses in the city of Lima. Her dream is to improve as an entrepreneur and have a larger business. What she enjoys most about the Communal Bank is the interest she earns from her savings.

loans.use: To purchase ten units of woven cloth, two piglets, and “Chacachi” (regional animals).

loans.name: Julio Mercedes

texts.es:
Julio tiene 36 años de edad, es casado y tiene 3 hijos de edad escolar. Viven en casa propia en Monsefú, una zona conocida por sus festividades turísticas y religiosas. La zona se encuentra ubicada a veinte minutos de la ciudad de Chiclayo. Su comunidad cuenta con servicios de luz, agua y un proyecto de alcantarillado.

Desde hace 3 años, cuenta con una pequeña bodega instalada en su domicilio la cual es atendida por su esposa. Allí ofrecen en venta a los vecinos y clientes de la zona diversos productos de consumo diario, entre productos de primera necesidad y abarrotes. El negocio cuenta con muy buena acogida y una clientela ya establecida, siendo una de las pocas bodegas en la zona. También Julio brinda servicios de albañilería y gasfitería, para conseguir ingresos adicionales al presupuesto familiar. 

Desea invertir su crédito en la compra de más mercadería, como útiles escolares, para vender en su bodega. También espera utilizar una parte para solventar gastos escolares para sus hijos menores. Por ello, ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un préstamo de 1500 nuevos soles. Edpyme le ofrece su crédito a una tasa de interés muy baja. Eso le permitirá al cliente trabajar tranquilo sin tener que recurrir a prestamistas informales que le cobran tasas altísimas, lo cual perjudica su liquidez diaria y retrasa su crecimiento tanto comercial como familiar. Julio es un cliente recurrente para Edpyme Alternativa y tiene buenas referencias personales y laborales. Les agradece mucho a los prestamistas de Kiva por su apoyo en el crecimiento de su negocio y la mejora de su condición familiar.
texts.en:
Julio is 36 years old, married, and has three children in school. He and his family live in their own home in Monsefú, an area known for its tourist and religious festivals. This district is located twenty minutes away from the city of Chiclayo. Julio’s community receives basic services such as electricity, water, and sewage drainage.

For the past three years, Julio and his wife have managed a small store in their home. There they offer their neighbors and customers different everyday consumer products ranging from basic necessities to groceries. This business has been well-received and has an established customer base since it is one of the few stores in the area. Julio also provides masonry and plumbing services to earn additional income for his family.

He wants to invest this loan in the purchase of more merchandise, such as school supplies, to sell in his store. In addition, he plans to use part of the loan to pay for the school expenses of his young children. For this reason, he is requesting a loan from Edpyme Alternativa in the amount of 1500 PEN. Edpyme is offering this loan at a very low interest rate. This will allow Julio to work effortlessly without having to resort to informal lenders that charge high interest rates, which would impact his daily liquidity and slow the growth of his family business. Julio is a repeat client of Edpyme Alternativa and has good personal and work-related references. He is extremely grateful for the Kiva loans that have helped support the growth of his business and improve the condition of his family.

loans.use: To purchase more merchandise to sell in his store.

loans.name: Felicitas

texts.es:
Felicitas es socia del Banco Comunal “Virgen de Lujan” ubicado en el distrito de Tinicachi, provincia Yunguyo y departamento de Puno, tiene 51 años de edad, de estado civil casada, tiene 10 hijos (1 independiente), la señora realizo estudios de educación primaria incompleto. 
Trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace siete años, su primer préstamo de S/. 300.00 nuevos soles, lo utilizó en su negocio de venta de tejidos y cierres.
En la actualidad requerirá de un nuevo préstamo por la suma S/. 3000.00 nuevos soles, dinero que invertirá en la compra de tres sacos de cierres de todo tamaño para prendas de vestir (casacas), telas, cinco aguayos y llicllas (telares), para luego venderlos.  La señora trabaja sola, su esposos es veterinario.
Su sueño es tener más capital para mejorar su negocio. Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal  son las ganancias del ahorro.
texts.en:
Felicitas is a member of the Communal Bank “Virgen de Lujan” which is located in the District of Tinicachi, Yunguyo Province, Department of Puno. She is 51 years old, in a common law marriage, and has ten children (one of whom is independent). Sra. Felicitas was not able to complete her elementary school education.

She has worked with Manuela Ramos for seven years. Her first loan of 300 PEN was used for her business of selling fabrics and zippers. At the moment, she is requesting a new loan in the amount of 3000 PEN to invest in the purchase three bags of zippers of all sizes for making jackets. She will also buy fabrics, five multi-colored cloths, and shawls for eventual resale. Felicitas works alone and her husband is a veterinarian by profession. Her dream is to have more capital to improve her business. What she enjoys most about the Communal Bank is the interest she earns from her savings.

loans.use: To purchase three bags of zippers, fabrics, five multi-colored cloths, and shawls for resale.

loans.name: Edwin Wilson

texts.es:
Edwin tiene 34 años, es casado y tiene 3 hijos. Viven un su casa propia en una zona rural del distrito de Paiján, una ciudad que pertenece a la provincia de Ascope ubicado en la región de la Libertad, que está a más de tres horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Desde hace más de 5 años, gana su vida brindando servicios de transporte público en su mototaxi propia, un vehículo que consiste en una moto y una cabina para movilizar personas en su interior. Desea utilizar su crédito para realizar algunos arreglos en su moto que se ha deteriorado debido al uso. Con las reparaciones, Edwin puede mantener en mejor estado su mototaxi lo que lo permitirá ofrecer una mejor calidad de servicio a sus clientes y aumentar sus ingresos para solventar sus gastos familiares. Por ello, ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un préstamo de 2000 nuevos soles. Edwin es muy trabajador y responsable. Tiene buenas referencias por parte de sus vecinos y conocidos. Su mayor anhelo es seguir mejorando su calidad de vida y tener ingresos para el futuro de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Edwin is 34 years old, married, and has three children. They live in their own home in a rural section of the District of Paiján, a city that is part of Ascope Province in the region of La Libertad, which is more than three hours away from the city of Chiclayo.

For more than five years, Edwin has been providing public transportation services with his own motorcycle taxi. This type of vehicle consists of a motorcycle with an attached cabin for carrying passengers. He wants to use this loan to make a few repairs to his motorcycle since it is wearing out with use. With these repairs, Edwin will be able to keep his motorcycle taxi in better condition so that he can provide better service to his customers and increase his income to cover his family’s expenses. For this reason, he is requesting a loan from Edpyme Alternativa in the amount of 2000 PEN.

Edwin is hardworking and responsible. He has good references from his neighbors and acquaintances. His greatest wish is to continue improving his quality of life and having income for his children’s future.

loans.use: To pay for maintenance and repairs to his motorcycle taxi.

loans.name: Liduvina

texts.es:
Liduvina es socia del Banco Comunal “Virgen de Lujan” ubicado en el distrito de Tinicachi, provincia Yunguyo y departamento de Puno, tiene 56 años de edad, de estado civil soltera, no  tiene hijos, la señora realizo estudios de educación primaria incompleto. 
Hace siete años trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos, su primer préstamo que fue de S/. 300.00 nuevos soles, lo invirtió en su negocio, ella se dedica a la venta sogas para animales caseros.
Con este crédito de S/. 1500.00 nuevos soles, comprará 50 kilos de soga para la fabricación de jáquima (materiales trenzables) para las vaquillas y burros, sus hermanos le ayudan con máquinas torcedoras.
Su sueño es mejorar y crecer en el negocio.	
Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal son las reuniones, la facilidad del préstamo y lo que gana el ahorro.
texts.en:
Liduvina is a member of the Communal Bank “Virgen de Lujan” which is located in the District of Tinicachi, Yunguyo Province, Department of Puno. She is 56 years old, single, and has no children. Sra. Liduvina was not able to complete her elementary school education.

She has worked with Manuela Ramos for seven years. Her first loan of 300 PEN was invested in her business selling ropes for domesticated animals.

With this loan of 1500 PEN, Liduvina will buy 50 kilos of rope for making braided halters for cattle and donkeys. Her siblings help with operating the braiding machines. Liduvina dreams of improving and growing her business. What she enjoys most about the Communal Bank are the convenience of the loan and the interest she earns from her savings.

loans.use: To purchase 50 kilos of rope for making braided animal halters.

loans.name: Sylvia Raquel

texts.es:
Sylvia tiene 40 años de edad, es casada y tiene dos hijos de 10 y 12 años de edad. Viven en el distrito de La Victoria, a unos treinta minutos de Chiclayo, la capital de la región de Lambayeque. 

Desde hace más de 8 años, cuenta con un negocio en el Mercado Modelo donde alquila acrílicos y vende artículos de piñatería y decoración. Ella elabora ella misma parte de la arte en su mercadería. Tiene un puesto fijo en el mercado adjudicado por la municipalidad. Ha solicitado un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles para invertir en la compra de más mercadería y materiales para elaborar su arte. También, desea utilizar una parte de su crédito para gastos escolares para sus dos hijos menores. Edpyme Alternativa le ofrece el crédito a una tasa más baja que otras entidades y prestamistas informales. Con el préstamo, puede continuar a invertir en su negocio y solventar sus gastos familiares sin perjudicar su liquidez diaria. Por ello, Sylvia les agradece mucho a los prestamistas de Kiva por su apoyo.
texts.en:
Sylvia is 40 years old, married, and has two children (ages 10 and 12). They live in the District of La Victoria, which is thirty minutes away from Chiclayo, the capital of Lambayeque region.

For more than eight years, Sylvia has managed a business at the Modelo Market where she rents out acrylic stands and pedestals and sells decorations and supplies for making piñatas. She also produces some of these artistic decorations as part of her merchandise. Sylvia has an established location at the market that was awarded to her by the city. She is requesting a loan of 1000 PEN to invest in the purchase of more merchandise and materials for making her crafts. In addition, part of the loan will be used to pay the school expenses of her two young children.

Edpyme Alternativa offers this loan at a much lower rate than other institutions and informal lenders. With this loan, Sylvia will be able to continue investing in her business and cover her family’s expenses without jeopardizing her daily liquidity. For this reason, she is extremely grateful for the loans supported by Kiva.

loans.use: To purchase more merchandise and materials for making decorations.

loans.name: Leticia

texts.es:
Leticia es socia del Banco Comunal “Virgen de Lujan” ubicado en el distrito de Tinicachi, provincia Yunguyo y departamento de Puno, tiene 27 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente y tiene 02 hijos.  La señora tiene estudios de educación secundaria. 
Viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace cinco años, su primer préstamo de S/. 300.00 nuevos soles, lo invirtió en su negocio de venta de mallas y  leñas.
Con este préstamo de S/. 3000.00 nuevos soles, comprará mil quinientos paquetes de leña para luego venderlos.  Su esposo le ayuda en el negocio, pero solo en ocasiones debido a que trabaja en construcción civil.
Su sueño es comprar una máquina bordadora para prendas de vestir como: casacas, gorros, etc.	
Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal son las reuniones, el intercambio de palabras con las socias y lo que gana su ahorro.
texts.en:
Leticia is a member of the Communal Bank “Virgen de Lujan” which is located in the District of Tinicachi, Yunguyo Province, Department of Puno. She is 27 years old, in a common law marriage, and has two children. Leticia has a high school education.

She started working with Manuela Ramos five years ago. Her first loan of 300 PEN was invested in her business of selling nets and firewood.

With this loan of 3000 PEN, she will buy 1500 parcels of firewood for eventual resale. Her husband helps with the business, but there are occasions when she works alone because he is called away on construction jobs.

Her dream is to buy an embroidery machine for designing garments such as jackets, hats, and other items. What she likes about the Communal Bank are the meetings, the conversations with the other members, and having the ability to save.

loans.use: To purchase 1500 parcels of firewood.

loans.name: America

texts.es:
America tiene 27 años de edad, es casada y tiene un hijo menor de 5 años. Viven en una comunidad pequeña en el distrito de Pítipo, una zona agrícola que se encuentra ubicada a una hora de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la Región Lambayeque.

Desde hace más de 5 años, se dedica al engorde de ganado vacuno. También cría ovinos y siembra maíz amarillo duro en el terreno de su padre. Su negocio tiene gran acogida ya que los animales criados en el campo son muy solicitados por su agradable sabor. Ha solicitado un préstamo de 2000 nuevos soles para invertir en la compra de alimento balanceado y en la adquisición de otro torete, un toro joven que engordará para luego vender. Estas compras la ayudarán aumentar sus ingresos y así poder realzar su nivel de vida. America es muy trabajadora y responsable. Ha manejado otro préstamo de Edpyme Alternativa y cumplió con sus obligaciones en manera puntual. Desde que se hizo cliente de Edpyme Alternativa, se ha visto crecer su negocio. Bajo su primer préstamo, solo se dedicaba a la crianza de animales mayores y ahora también se dedica a la crianza de ovinos menores.
texts.en:
America is 27 years old, married, and has a 5 year-old son.  They live in a small community in the Pitipo district, an agricultural area that is located an hour from the city of Chiclayo, the capital of the Lambayeque region. 

She has been raising cattle for more than 5 years.  She also raises sheep and cultivates yellow corn on her father's land.  Her business has been well accepted, since the animals raised in the country are sought after because of their pleasant taste.  She has requested a loan of 2,000 Peruvian soles to invest in the purchase of balanced feed and the purchase of a young bull that she will fatten to later sell.  These purchases will help her to increase her income and in this way raise her standard of living.  America is very hardworking and responsible.  She took an earlier loan with Edpyme Alternativa, and she fulfilled her obligations in a punctual manner.  Since the time that she became a client of Edpyme Alternativa she has seen growth in her business.  When she took her first loan she was only raising large animals, but now she also raises sheep.

loans.use: to buy balanced feed and a young bull

loans.name: Rosa Aurelia

texts.es:
Rosa es madre D. casa D. 51 años D. edad. Vive junto a su esposo e hijo menor en su casa propia en TambogranD., una zona agrícola situada en la región Piura, a más D. cuatro horas D. la ciudad D. Chiclayo, capital D. la región Lambayeque.

DesD. hace 6 años, se dedica a la crianza y venta D. ganado ovino. Engorda los animales y una vez que ellos alcancen un buen tamaño y peso los venD. en el mercado local. Ha solicitado un préstamo D. 1400 nuevos soles a Edpyme Alternativa para invertir en la compra D. alimento balanceado para sus animales. Así pueden obtener el peso y tamaño ideal en menos tiempo. 

Rosa es muy trabajadora y responsable. Ha tenido otro préstamo con Edpyme Alternativa y cumplió sus obligaciones en manera puntual.
texts.en:
Rosa is a stay at home mom, she's 51 years old.  She lives with her husband and youngest son in a house they own located in TambogranD., an agricultural zone located in the region of Piura, more than four hours from the city of Chiclayo, capital of the Lambayeque region.

She has raised and sold sheep for six years. She raises the animals and once they reach a good size and weight she sells them in the local market.  She has requested a loan of 1,400 new soles ($525) to Edpyme Alternativa to invest them in buying balanced feed for her sheep.  This way they will reach the ideal weight and size in less time.

Rosa is very hardworking and responsible.  She had another loan with Edpyme Alternative and maD. the repayments punctually.

loans.use: to buy balanced feed for livestock

loans.name: Pedro Pablo

texts.es:
Pedro es padre de casa de 51 años de edad. Vive junto a su esposa y tres hijos menores en casa propia en el caserío La Esperanza, una hora y media del distrito de Olmos en Lambayeque. Viven en la parte rural y no cuenta con servicios básicos de agua y luz. 

Desde hace seis años, se dedica a la crianza de animales menores: ganado ovino, caprino, aves de corral y chanchos. Realiza esta actividad en la parte posterior de su domicilio. También trabaja como negociante de madera. Vende sus productos en los mercados locales a los negociantes que suelen visitar la zona en donde reside. Estas actividades lo ayudan solventar sus gastos familiares. Desea usar el crédito de 1500 nuevos soles para ampliar su negocio y comprar alimentos balanceados y más animales para engordar y vender.
texts.en:
Pedro is a 51 year old father.  He lives with his wife and their three minor children in their own house in the village of La Esperanza.  It is one and a half hours from the Olmos district in Lambayeque.  They live in a rural area, and they do not have basic services like running water and electricity.

For six years he has been raising small animals like sheep, goats, poultry, and pigs.  He does this in an area in back of his house.  He also works as a wood merchant.  He sells his products at the local markets.  He sells to businessmen who usually visit the area where he lives.

These activities help pay the family expenses.  He wants to use the loan for 1,500 soles to expand his business.  He will buy balanced feed and more animals to fatten and sell.

loans.use: to buy balanced feed and more animals

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase fabric and thread for embroidering.

loans.name: Segundo Guadalupe

texts.es:
Segundo tiene 49 años, es casado y tiene dos hijos a su cargo. Vive en casa propia que heredó de un pariente en el distrito de José Leonardo Ortiz en Chiclayo, la capital de la región de Lambayeque. Su comunidad es emergente y pequeña y solo cuenta con servicios de luz, no de agua.

Desde hace más de 10 años, gana su vida brindando servicios de enllantadora. Repara los llantos de mototaxis, autos y camiones que necesitan atención de enllante diariamente. Realiza esta actividad durante los días. Para obtener ingresos adicionales, durante las noches, trabaja como vigilante para una empresa de seguridad. Hace un año que trabaja como guardia. Segundo desea ampliar su negocio con la inversión de 1500 nuevos soles en la compra de una mototaxi de segunda mano la cual alquilará. Le dará mayores ingresos y por consiguiente le permitirá solventar más sus gastos familiares.
texts.en: Segundo is 49 years old, married and has two children. He lives in his own home, which he inherited from a relative, in the district of José Leonardo Ortiz in Chiclayo, the capital of the Lambayeque region of Peru. It's a small but emerging community that has electric but not water services. For more than 10 years Segundo has made a living providing tire-mounting services. He daily repairs tires on mototaxis, automobiles and trucks that need his attention. He does this job during the day, and to earn extra income, he has worked as a guard for a security company at night for the past year. Segundo wants to expand his tire business with an investment of 1,500 soles to put toward the purchase of a second-hand mototaxi, which he can then rent out. This will provide him with more income and therefore allow him to cover more family expenses.

loans.use: to purchase a mototaxi to rent out.

loans.name: Mónica Patricia

texts.es:
Mónica Patricia C. C. motivada por las ganas de aportar a cubrir los gastos del hogar donde su esposo como pescador realiza grandes esfuerzos para sostener a sus 4 hijos, esta emprendedora decidió darle vida a su propio negocio, una tienda de diversos productos de la canasta familiar. 

Poco a poco Mónica ha ido surtiendo su negocio para lograr buenas ventas para mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia pues como ella misma lo afirma con lo que gana su esposo no alcanzaba en muchas oportunidades ni para la comida.

Sus deseos de crecer son enormes, por eso, necesita de un préstamo para comparar más productos y así ofrecer diversidad a sus clientes y aumentar sus ganancias.
texts.en: Mónica, motivated by the desire to provide for her four children and cover household expenses along with her hard-working husband, who's a fisherman, decided to start her own business. This enterprising woman set up a convenience store with a variety of products. Little by little Mónica has been stocking her store to increase her sales and improve the quality of life for her and her family since she says that what her husband makes isn't enough to provide food or many opportunities. Her desire to grow her business is enormous, but to do so she needs a loan to purchase more products and in this way offer more variety to her customers and increase her profits.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise to stock her store

loans.name: Luz Ayda

texts.es:
Luz tiene 20 años de edad y es soltera. Vive en el distrito de José Leonardo Ortiz en Chiclayo, la capital de la región de Lambayeque. Su comunidad es pequeña y es en vías de crecimiento. Actualmente solo cuenta con servicios de luz; están en el proceso de instalar servicios de agua.

Desde hace más de 2 años, cuenta con una bodega donde ofrece en venta a los vecinos y clientes de la zona diversos productos de consumo diario, entre productos de primera necesidad y abarrotes. Su bodega está ubicada en el Mercado Carolina el cual es muy concurrido por el público de la comunidad. Por ello, su negocio cuenta con muy buena acogida y tiene una clientela fiel. Luz ha solicitado un préstamo de 1000 nuevos soles para invertir en la compra de más mercadería para su bodega, específicamente arroz y azúcar. Luz espera incrementar sus ingresos para poder aumentar su nivel de vida.
texts.en:
Luz is 20 years old and single. She lives in the district of José Leonardo Ortiz in Chiclayo, which is the capital of the Lambayeque region. Her community is small and is growing. Currently she only has light services; they are in the process of installing water services. 

For more than 2 years, she has had a store where she offers a sale to her neighbors and customers in the area on a variety of everyday consumer products including staple items and groceries. Her shop is located in the Carolina Market, which is very popular with the public community. Therefore, her business is very well received and she has loyal customers. Luz has requested a loan of 1000 soles to invest in the purchase of more merchandise for her store, specifically rice and sugar. Luz hopes to increase revenue to raise her standard of living.

loans.use: To buy more rice and sugar for her store.

loans.name: Ricardo De Jesús

texts.es:
Desde niño, Ricardo de Jesús P. R. ha sabido como rebuscarse la vida, pues desde temprana edad y por los escasos recursos de su numerosa familia tuvo que enfrentarse con diferentes oficios que fue aprendiendo de quienes le daban la oportunidad de ganarse algún dinero para ayudar en su hogar. 

Después de haber pasado por labores muy diversas, a este emprendedor se le ocurrido la idea de tener lo propio y pensó en hacer jugo de naranja para calmar la sed de transeúntes y choferes que se desplazaban por la zona donde vivía; detrás del jugo vinieron otros productos que sus mismos clientes le pedían, ahora también vende periódicos y algunos mecatos.

Ricardo necesita de un crédito para comprar algunos productos y abastecer su negocio, así como la compra de una licuadora y terminar el mesón que hace parte de su punto de venta.
texts.en:
Since he was a boy, Ricardo de Jesús P. R. has known how to make a living because from an early age, owing to the scarce resources of his large family, he had to take on a number of different trades, learning which gave him the opportunity to earn some money to help his household.

After having worked in a number of very different jobs, this entrepreneur had the idea of setting up his own business.  He decided to make orange juice to quench the thirst of passersby and drivers who were traveling in the area where he lives.  He then added other products that his customers were asking for.  Now he also sells newspapers and some packed lunches.

Ricardo needs a loan to buy some products and stock his business.  He will also buy a blender and finish off the counter that is a part of his stall.

loans.use: to buy stock and to make some physical changes to his stall

loans.name: Charasol (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
El banco comunal Charasol  está conformado por 8 mujeres quienes laboran en diferentes actividades las que les permiten ayudar en la economía de sus hogares, nuestras socias son mujeres luchadoras y a pesar de las dificultades en sus trabajos y negocios nunca dejan de sonreír. Viven en la ciudad de Azogues que se caracteriza por la belleza de sus calles, iglesias y deliciosa gastronomía que le cautiva a propios y extraños, su gente es muy amable y cordial.

La Señora. Blanca G. vive en el entro de la ciudad de Azogues, se encuentra en su quinto crédito que realiza en el banco comunal y le gusta porque le han permitido crecer en su negocio, ella tiene 42 años de edad, es divorciada y no tiene hijos, vive en su casa propia. 
Doña Blanca se dedica a los quehaceres de su hogar y también atiende su tienda de abarrotes que la tiene hace 2 años,  labora en ella de lunes a sábados desde las 9 de la mañana hasta la una de la tarde. El dinero de su crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de productos para su tienda como: arroz, azúcar, aceite, detergentes, embutidos, etc. Su mayor sueño es viajar a los Estados Unidos

La Señora. Jackeline G. vive en la ciudad de Azogues, tiene 26 años, es casada y tiene 2 hijos de 4  y 1 año de edad. Su esposo es de profesión chofer, no tienen casa propia por lo que viven en casa de sus padres y comparten los gastos del hogar.
Doña Jackeline se dedica al cuidado de sus hijos, pero para apoyar a la economía de su hogar se dedica a la venta de cosméticos Avon y Yanbal, lleva trabajando en esta actividad hace 2 años. 
Se encuentra en su quinto crédito que realiza en el banco comunal y lo va a invertir en la compra de perfumes, cremas, bisutería y cosméticos para surtir mucho más su negocio. Su meta es tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
The community bank Charasol is formed by eight women that work in different activities that allow them to help the economy of their homes, our members are fighters that in spite of the difficulties in their jobs and businesses they never give up or stop smiling.  They live in the city of Azoques, characterized for the beauty of its streets, churches and delicious gastronomy that locals and out-of-towners like, its people is kind and friendly.

Blanca G. lives downtown in the city of Azoques, this is her fifth loan with the community bank and she likes it because it has allowed her to grow her business, she is 42, divorced, has no children and lives in a house she owns.  In addition to her housekeeping activities, Blanca works at the grocery store she's had for two years, she works there from Monday to Saturday from 9 a.m. to 1 p.m.  The money from her loan will be invested in purchasing products for her store such as: rice, sugar, oil, detergent, deli, etc.  Her wish is to travel to the United States.

Jackeline G. lives in the city of Azoques, she is 26 years old, married and has two children ages four and one.  Her husband is a driver, they don't own a house and live in her parents' house, sharing the expenses with them. Jackeline takes care of her children, but to support the home economy she sells Avon and Yanbal cosmetics, she has been selling these products for two years.  She is on her fifth credit with the community bank, which will be invested in purchasing perfumes, lotion, jewelry and cosmetics to stock up her store.  Her goal is to buy a house.

loans.use: To purchase rice, sugar, oil, detergent, deli, perfume, lotion, jewelery, cosmetics, etc.

loans.name: Aurelio

texts.es:
Aurelio tiene 55 años de edad y es casado. Vive en casa propia en la ciudad de Morropon en el departamento de Piura, unas cuatro horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, la capital de la región de Lambayeque. 

Desde hace muchos años, se dedica a la crianza y venta de ganado vacuno. Engorda los animales y cuando alcancen un buen tamaño, los vende en los mercados locales. Cuenta con una clientela ya establecida y fiel. Aprendió esta actividad de su padre, es decir conoce a la perfección este rubro. Su negocio tiene gran acogida ya que los animales criados en el campo son muy solicitados por su agradable sabor. Ha solicitado un préstamo de 1000 nuevos soles para invertir en la compra de alimento balanceado y en la adquisición de más animales para engordar y vender. Su meta es aumentar sus ingresos para seguir invirtiendo en su negocio. En el futuro, desea tener una granja de ganado vacuno y cabrillo.
texts.en:
Aurelio is 55 years old, and is married.  He lives in his own home in Morropón, department of Piura, some four hours from Chiclayo, capital of the Lambayeque region.

For many years, he has raised and sold cattle.  He fattens the animals and when they have reached a good size, he sells them in local markets.  He has a loyal, established clientele.  He learned the business from his father, which is to say that he knows the field to the nth degree.  His business is well received, since animals raised in the country are in demand because of the flavor of their meat.  He has requested a loan of 1000 new soles, to buy balanced feed, and to purchase more animals to fatten and sell.  His goal is to increase his revenue, in order to continue to invest in his business.  In the future, he would like to have a ranch for cattle and goats.

loans.use: To buy more animals and balanced feed

loans.name: Lolita

texts.en:
Lolita P. is from the village of Sinonoc, Sinacaban, Misamis Occidental. She is 53 years-old and married with four adult children. To make a living, Lolita owns and operates a business raising livestock. While not the only means for generating revenue, the main source of income comes from raising goats for sale. Lolita is just starting this business.

In 2011, Lolita joined Kiva partner GDMPC in order to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Lolita is requesting a first loan of 5,000 PHP which will be used to purchase breeding livestock, feed and other supplies. She plans to use the additional revenue generated to improve and expand her business. 

About GDMPC:

GDMPC is one of the most progressive cooperatives in Mindanao, Philippines. It has seven branches covering the provinces of Zamboanga del Sur, Lanao del Norte and Misamis Occidental. Its membership is composed mostly of farmers, fisherfolks and small entrepreneurs.

*Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva.  Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, Kiva created this template for our Field Partner to allow them to continue to post loans in English while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: to purchase breeding livestock ,feed and other supplies

loans.name: Jesus Maria

texts.es:
Maria tiene 33 años de edad y es soltera. Vive en casa de sus padres en el distrito de Tambogrande, una zona agrícola situada en la región Piura, a más de cuatro horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la región Lambayeque.

Desde hace tres años, se dedica a la crianza y venta de ganado ovino. Ella cría los animales en la parte posterior de su domicilio y cuando estos alcancen un buen nivel de desarrollo las ofrece en venta a los negociantes que suelen visitar la zona en donde reside. Cuenta con una clientela ya establecida y fiel. Ha solicitado un préstamo de 1500 nuevos soles para invertir en la compra de alimento balanceado para sus animales y así obtener el peso y tamaño ideal en menos tiempo.
texts.en:
Maria is 33 years old, and is single.  She lives with her parents, in the Tambogrande district, an agricultural area in the Piura region, more than four hours from Chiclayo, capital of the Lambayeque region.

For three years she has raised and sold sheep.  She raises the animals in the back section of her home, and when they have developed to the right level, she offers them for sale to buyers who visit the area where she lives.  She has a loyal, established clientele.  She has requested a loan of 1500 new soles, to buy balanced feed for her animals, and thereby to reach the ideal weight and size in less time.

loans.use: to buy balanced feed for her livestock

loans.name: Aileen

texts.en:
Aileen P. is from the village of Cagay-anon, Sinacaban, Misamis Occidental. She is 29 years-old and married with two school-aged children. To make a living, Aileen owns and operates a business operating transportation services. While not the only means for generating revenue, the main source of income comes from operating tricycle transport services. Aileen has been engaged in her business for over five years and earns approximately 2,500 PHP a month.

In 2009, Aileen joined Kiva partner GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Aileen is requesting a new loan of 15,000 PHP which will be used to purchase tires and other accessories. This loan will be the second loan taken out by Aileen from GDMPC. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family. 

About GDMPC:

GDMPC is one of the most progressive cooperatives in Mindanao, Philippines. It has seven branches covering the provinces of Zamboanga del Sur, Lanao del Norte and Misamis Occidental. Its membership is composed mostly of farmers, fisherfolks and small entrepreneurs.

*Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva.  Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, Kiva created this template for our Field Partner to allow them to continue to post loans in English while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: to purchase tires and other accessories

loans.name: Luceros En La Mañana Group

texts.es: El grupo se llama Luceros En La Mañana, porque se encuentra en la parte alta de la comunidad, y se ubica en Tehuacan en el estado de Puebla en Mexico. El grupo esta conformado por 11 integrantes y es la 3 vez que solicitan credito. La señora Irma P. es integrante de este grupo, ella tiene una estetica y también se dedica a la venta de aves, que inicio hace 5 años. Solicita el prestamo para la compra de articulos de belleza y asi poder tener más variedad en sus productos y mejores servicios, también lo pide para la compra-venta de aves. Tiene 43 años, estudió hasta la primaria, es casada y tiene en total 2 hijos, 1 varon y 1 mujer de 12 y 18 años de edad respectivamente. Sus clientes opinan que tiene buen servicio devido a la variedad en sus productos, además de estar en una buena ubicacion,  ella cuenta con las aves necesarias para cualquier eventualidad. Al momento de solicitar este prestamo se siente alegre porque va a poder cumplir con las espectativas de sus clientes. Quiere este crédito para invertir en su negocio y asi obtener mayores ganancias. Espera que su negocio tenga crecimiento y seguir apoyadoce economicamente para salir adelante ya que su hijo decea seguir estudiandoy ella quiere brindarle esa ilución.
texts.en:
This group is called Luceros En La Mañana [Bright Stars in the Morning], because they are in the upper part of the community, and they live in Tehuacan in the Mexican state of Puebla. The group is made up of 11 members and this is the third time they have requested a loan. Señora Irma P. is a member of this group. For 5 years she has had a beauty salon and she also sells birds. She requests the loan in order to purchase beauty products so she can have a wider variety of products and provide better services, and also for buying and selling birds.

She is 43 years old, went to primary school, is married and has 2 children, a boy, 12, and a girl, 18. Her customers say she has a good business owing to the variety of her products, as well as a good location, and she has the necessary birds for any eventuality. She feels happy about requesting this loan because she will be able to meet her customers' expectations. She wants this loan in order to invest in her business and make higher profits. She hopes her business will grow and continue supporting her economically so she can get ahead, since her son wishes to continue studying and wants to fulfill that dream.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise for her beauty salon and birds

loans.name: Levi

texts.en:
Levi S. is from the village of Poblacion, Sinacaban, Misamis Occidental. She is 46 years-old and married with four adult children. To make a living, Levi owns and operates a business in the agriculture sector raising crops. While not the only means for generating revenue, the main source of income  comes from planting and harvesting  a variety of vegetables for sale. Levi has been engaged in her business for over one years and earns approximately 1,000 PHP a month.

In 2011, Levi joined Kiva partner GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Levi is requesting a first loan of 5,000 PHP which will be used to purchase additional seedlings and fertilizers such as manure. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve and expand her business. 

About GDMPC:

GDMPC is one of the most progressive cooperatives in Mindanao, Philippines. It has seven branches covering the provinces of Zamboanga del Sur, Lanao del Norte and Misamis Occidental. Its membership is composed mostly of farmers, fisherfolks and small entrepreneurs.

*Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva.  Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, Kiva created this template for our Field Partner to allow them to continue to post loans in English while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: to purchase additional seedlings and fertilizers such as manure

loans.name: Petronila

texts.es: Petronilla tiene 24 años de edad, es soltera y tiene un hijo. Viven en casa propia en la parte rural del distrito de Manuel Antonio Meson ubicado en el distrito de Lambayeque. Desde hace 3 años, se dedica a la crianza y comercialización de animales menores. Realiza esta actividad en un terreno situado cerca de su domicilio. Aprendió esta actividad de sus padres, es decir conoce a la perfección el rubro. Vende sus productos en el mercado local a sus vecinos y los negociantes que suelen visitar su zona. Cuentan con clientela ya establecida y fiel. Adicionalmente, cuenta con una mototaxi que alquila a otros conductores. Ha solicitado un préstamo para realizar mejoras en su corral y para mantener su unidad motorizada, lo cual a la postre le dará la oportunidad de mejorar sus servicios y incrementar sus ingresos. Petronilla es muy trabajadora y cuenta con buenas referencias laborales y personales de su comunidad.
texts.en: Petronilla is 24 years old, single and has a son.  She lives in a house that she owns in the rural part of the District of Manual Antonio Meson Muros located in the Region of Lambayeque.  She has worked raising and selling young animals for the past three years on a piece of land located near her house.  She learned this job from her parents, that is to say that she knows the business very well.  She sells her products at the local market to her neighbors and the businessmen that visit the area.  She has established a loyal clientele.  In addition, she has a motorcycle taxi that she rents to other drivers.  She has requested a loan in order to make improvements to her animal pen and to provide maintenance to her vehicle.  In the end, this will give her the opportunity to improve her services and increase her income.  Petronilla is very hardworking and she has good professional and personal references in her community.

loans.use: to make improvements to her animal pen and to provide maintenance to her vehicle

loans.name: Felipe

texts.es: Felipe tiene 46 años de edad y es soltero. Vive en casa propia en la parte urbano-marginal del distrito de José Leonardo Ortiz, en la ciudad de Chiclayo, la capital de la región de Lambayeque. Actualmente, no cuenta con servicios básicos de agua y luz. Felipe gana su vida brindando servicios de seguridad en el Centro de Salud de su distrito. Realiza esta actividad desde hace 7 años y conoce el rubro a la perfección. Cuenta con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales. Ha solicitado un préstamo de 1000 nuevos soles a Edpyme Alternativa para invertir en la compra de artefactos para su negocio y también para solventar gastos personales y de su hogar.
texts.en: Felipe is 46 years old and is single.  He lives in a house that he owns in the urban-marginal part of the District of José Leonardo Ortiz in the city of Chiclayo, capital of the Region of Lambayeque.  He does not currently have basic water and electric utilities.  Felipe earns a living providing security at his district’s Health Center.  He has worked in this position for more than seven years and knows the business very well.  He has very good personal and professional references.  He has requested a loan of 1,000 Peruvian Nuevos Soles (PEN) from Edpyme Alternativa to invest in the purchase of items for his business and also to cover personal and household expenses.

loans.use: to buy items for his security business.

loans.name: Elver

texts.es:
Elver tiene 26 años de edad y es soltero. Vive en casa de sus padres en el distrito de Tambogrande, una zona agrícola situada en la región Piura, a más de cuatro horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la región Lambayeque. Vive en la parte rural y no cuenta con servicios básicos de agua o luz. 

Se dedica a la crianza de ganado ovino y aves de corral, los cuales cría y engorda para luego comercializarlos en el mercado local. Desde hace más de 6 años, realiza esta  actividad, con el apoyo de su padre, en una parte posterior de su domicilio. Ha solicitado un préstamo de 1000 nuevos soles a Edpyme Alternativa para la compra de alimentos balanceados para el engorde de sus animales. Su meta es obtener un buen peso y tamaño de sus animales y venderlos a un mejor precio y seguir creciendo en su negocio.
texts.en:
Elver is 26 years old and single. He lives in his parents’ house in the District of Tambogrande, an agricultural area located in the Piura Region more than four hours from the city of Chiclayo, capital of the Lambayeque Region. He lives in the rural area and does not have basic utilities like water or electricity.

He works raising sheep and poultry, which he raises and fattens in the rear part of his house to later sell at the local market. He has worked in this business for more than six years with the support of his father. He has requested a loan of 1,000 Peruvian Nuevos Soles (PEN) from Edpyme Alternativa for the purchase of balanced feed to fatten his animals. His goal is for his animals to reach a good size and weight so that he can sell them at a better price and his business can continue to grow.

loans.use: to buy balanced feed

loans.name: Flormira

texts.es: Flormira tiene 45 años de edad, y es madre soltera con una hija. Vive en la parte urbano-marginal el distrito de José Ortiz Leonardo en Chiclayo, la capital de la región de Lambayeque. Desde hace más de 8 años, gana su vida vendiendo frutas como plátanos, granadillas, y guabos en el Mercado Moshoqueque, un mercado muy conocido en la región y con bastante movimiento. Aprendió esta actividad de su madre, es decir conoce a la perfección el rubro de este negocio. Cuenta con clientela ya establecida en la zona. Desea ampliar su negocio con la compra de más mercadería. Por ello, ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un préstamo de 500 nuevos soles. Flormira es muy trabajadora y responsable. Su mayor anhelo es incrementar sus ingresos para poder seguir sacando adelante a su familia.
texts.en: Flormira is 45 years old and is the single mother of one daughter.  She lives in the urban-marginal part of the District of José Leonardo Ortiz in Chiclayo, capital of the Lambayeque Region.  She has been earning a living selling fruits such as bananas, granadillas, and guama for more than eight years at the Moshoqueque Market, a well-known market in the region with many customers.  She learned this job from her mother, that is to say that she knows the business very well.  She has an established clientele in the area.  She wants to expand her business with the purchase of more merchandise.  As a result, she is requesting a loan of 500 Peruvian Nuevos Soles (PEN) from Edpyme Alternativa.  Flormira is very hardworking and responsible.  Her biggest dream is to increase her earnings in order to continue getting her family ahead in life.

loans.use: to buy more fruit to sell

loans.name: José Ovidio

texts.es:
José Ovidio S. E. de 43 años de edad, reside en el Municipio de San José Guayabal del Departamento de Cuscatlán. Vive en condiciones muy humildes con su madre, tia y primo. Tiene 10 años de vivir en la zona, por lo que es muy conocido por los habitantes del municipio. José se dedica al tranporte  de carga, personas, y a la agricultura en epocas de siembra. Es un hombre trabajador, confiable y responsable.
El transporte de carga es el negocio que le genera la mayor parte de sus ingresos durante el año, los cuales le sirven para ayudar economicamente a su familia. Su sueño es mejorar las condiciones de su vehículo para poder hacer un mejor trabajo y lograr tener un poco mas de ingresos del mismo. A decidido prestar un mejor servicio de trasporte, por lo que solicita este crédito para la compra de los repuetos necesarios para el mantenimiento y mejora de su vehiculo y de esta forma poder mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en: José Ovidio S. E., 43, lives in the San José Guayabal district of the Department of Cuscatlán.  He lives humbly with his mother, aunt, and cousin.  He has lived in the area for 10 years and is very well-known among the inhabitants. José transports people and goods and is a farm worker in the sowing season.  Transporting cargo is the business that generates most of his annual income, which he uses to help his family economically.  He wants to improve the condition of his vehicle so he can have better work and make a bit more money out of it.  He has decided to improve his transport service and is asking for a loan to buy the necessary supplies to maintain and upgrade his vehicle and thereby improve the quality of life for himself and his family.

loans.use: to buy supplies to improve his vehicle

loans.name: Julieta

texts.en:
Julieta T. is from the city of Capucao, Ozamiz City. She is 49 years-old and married with five adult children. To make a living, Julieta owns and operates a business operating transportation services. While not the only means for generating revenue, the main source of income comes from operating motor transport services. Julieta has been engaged in her business for over ten years and earns approximately 5,000 PHP a month.

In 2007, Julieta joined Kiva partner GDMPC in order to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Julieta has successfully repaid a previous loan of 5,000 PHP from GDMPC. Julieta is requesting a new loan of 5,000 PHP which will be used to repair her existing vehicle in order to provide better service. This loan will be the second loan taken out by Julieta from GDMPC. She plans to use the additional revenue generated to improve the general living conditions of her family. 

About GDMPC:

GDMPC is one of the most progressive cooperatives in Mindanao, Philippines. It has seven branches covering the provinces of Zamboanga del Sur, Lanao del Norte and Misamis Occidental. Its membership is composed mostly of farmers, fisherfolks and small entrepreneurs.

*Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva.  Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, Kiva created this template for our Field Partner to allow them to continue to post loans in English while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: to repair existing vehicle in order to provide better service

loans.name: Vidal

texts.es: Vidal tiene 52 años de edad y es casado. Vive en casa propia la cual está ubicada en la ciudad de Morropon en Piura, a unas cuatro horas de Chiclayo, la capital de la región de Lambayeque. Se dedica a la venta de abono y a la crianza y comercialización de animales. Cría los animales en la parte posterior de su domicilio y cuando estos alcancen un buen nivel de desarrollo las ofrece en venta a los negociantes que suelen visitar la zona en donde reside. Cuenta con una clientela ya establecida y fiel. Lleva varios años de experiencia en este rubro, el cual conoce a la perfección porque lo aprendió de su padre. Ha solicitado un préstamo de 1000 nuevos soles a Edpyme Alternativa para comprar alimentos balanceados y más animales menores para criar. Su mayor anhelo es seguir invirtiendo en su negocio y aumentar sus ingresos para solventar sus gastos personales y de su hogar.
texts.en:
Vidal is 52 and married.  He lives in his own house, located in the city of Morrpon in Piura, about four hours from Chiclayo, the capital of the Lambayeque region. He sells fertilizer and raises and sells animals.  He raises the animals in the back of his house, and when they reach a good stage of development, he sells them to traders who visit the area where he lives.  He has an established and loyal clientele.  He has many years of experience in this line of work, of which he has a perfect knowledge because his father taught him about it.  

He is seeking a loan from microfinance partner Edpyme Alternativa to buy nutritionally balanced feed and more small animals to raise.  He wants to invest in his business and increase his income to pay off his personal and living expenses.

loans.use: to buy feed and to small animals to raise

loans.name: Maria Yrene

texts.es:
Maria tiene 22 años de edad, es soltera y no tiene hijos. Vive con su familia en el distrito de Tambogrande, una zona agrícola situada en la región Piura, a más de cuatro horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la región Lambayeque.

Desde hace 3 años, cuenta con una bodega donde vende a los vecinos y clientes de la zona diversos productos de consumo diario, entre productos de primera necesidad y abarrotes. La bodega está situada en su domicilio. Actualmente, desea ampliar su negocio con la compra de más mercadería. También, desea responder a la demanda para útiles escolares durante esta temporada escolar. Por ello, ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un préstamo de 2000 nuevos soles. Con esta inversión, Maria puede lograr mayores ganancias y seguir invirtiendo en su negocio. Maria es un cliente recurrente de Edpyme y ha cumplido con sus otras obligaciones de manera puntual.
texts.en:
Maria is 22 years old, single, and doesn't have any children.  She lives with her family in Tambogrande district, an agricultural area located in Piura region, more than four hours from the city of Chiclayo, the capital of Lambayeque region.

For 3 years, María has owned a grocery store where she sells essentials and groceries to her neighbors and customers from the area.  The store is located in her home.  María would currently like to expand her business by purchasing more merchandise.  She would also like to respond to the demand for school supplies during the current back-to-school season.  For this reason, she has requested a loan for 2,000 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa.  With this investment, María will be able to make more profits and continue investing in her business.  She is a long-standing client of Edpyme and has made her previous repayments punctually.

loans.use: to buy school supplies to sell

loans.name: Amparo

texts.en:
Amparo C. is from the village of San Nicolas Tudela Misamis Occidental. She is 47 years old and married, with 5 adult-aged children. To make a living, Amparo operates motor transport services. She has been engaged in her business for more than 2 years and earns approximately 4000 PHP a month.

In 2007, Amparo joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Amparo has successfully repaid a previous loan of 10000 PHP from GDMPC. Amparo is requesting a new loan of 12000 PHP, which will be used to repair an existing vehicle for better service. This loan will be the third loan Amparo has taken out from GDMPC. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve her family's living conditions. 

About GDMPC:

GDMPC is one of the most progressive cooperatives in Mindanao, Philippines. It has seven branches covering the provinces of Zamboanga del Sur, Lanao del Norte and Misamis Occidental. Its membership is composed mostly of farmers, fishers and small entrepreneurs.

*Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva.  Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, Kiva created this template for our Field Partner to allow them to continue to post loans in English while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: to repair an existing vehicle for better service
